meanings.definition: Bovids: a family of ruminant mammals including cattle, sheep, goats, and antelopes.
meanings.sent1: Many farmers raise bovids for their milk and meat.
meanings.sent2: The bovids grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The bovids decided to have a dance-off to determine the leader of the herd.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the bovids are the hardworking employees who keep everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The majestic bovids roamed the savannah, their horns gleaming in the sunlight.
